pages.text: $(li)Name Tags can be used to change the name of any creature.$(br)$(li)They can be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/librarian)Librarians$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by Name Tags too.
$(li)First, in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l), you can change the name of a Name Tag in exchange of a Level of experience.

$(li)Then, you only have to right click to any kind of creature while you are holding a Name Tag in your hand.$(br)$(li)Additionally, the most of creatures that have a custon name applied with a Name Tag will never naturally despawn.$(br)$(li)Some creatures, as the $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/platypus)Platypus$(/l) will change if you put them a specific name.
